QuestData.Title: Trinkle Trinkle Little Twerp
QuestData.Description:
<On the note are the scribblings for a plan to steal silkstrider larvae and cook them.
It is signed by someone named Trinkle.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This spriggan might find little Grubby before we do! We should stop Trinkle anyway. Think of all the poor silkstrider children.
